data.title: Mad Max 4: Fury Road
data.meta_description: A gut-punch in the action movie wasteland that recalls the sort of pictures that never took the audience for granted.
data.text:
8 months, 3 weeks

10 Best Charlize Theron Movies of All Time

Our favorite performances by one of Hollywood's most successful actresses ever

1 year, 2 months

The 10 Best Car Chases of All Time

Buckle up...

2 years, 4 months

Charlize Theron 'Didn't Feel Safe' on Mad Max Set With Tom Hardy

“They didn’t want to look at each other.”

2 years, 5 months

Mad Max: Fury Road Director Wanted Eminem For Lead Role

And Rihanna auditioned for Furiosa, too.

2 years, 10 months

Mad Max: Fury Road Cars are Up for Auction

I live, I buy, I live again.

3 years, 4 months

Dust Storms on Mars Might Glow with Tiny Sparks, Study Shows

As if dust storms weren't ominous enough already, on Mars, they might glow due to electricity, according to a new study.

3 years, 7 months

Mad Max: Fury Road Immortan Joe Actor Hugh Keays-Byrne Dies

Hugh Keays-Byrne, the actor behind iconic Mad Max antagonists Toecutter and Immortan Joe, has died at 73.

3 years, 9 months

Mad Max Furiosa Spinoff Casts Anya Taylor-Joy, Chris Hemsworth, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II

Mad Max spinoff casts Anya Taylor-Joy as Furiosa, who will take over the role from Charlize Theron who played the character in Fury Road.

4 years, 3 months

Furiosa: The New Mutants' Anya Taylor-Joy Reportedly Up for Mad Max Spin-Off

The New Mutants' Anya Taylor-Joy is reportedly up for a role in the Mad Max Furiosa spin-off movie.

4 years, 11 months

Mad Max Sequels Are Going to Happen, Says Director George Miller

The director says it's "pretty clear" his planned Mad Max sequels and Furiosa spinoff are "going to happen."

8 years, 6 months

Director George Miller says 'no more Mad Max' comment untrue

According to the Fury Road director, he was misquoted and still has more Mad Max stories to tell.

8 years, 6 months

Director George Miller says he'll 'never make another Mad Max movie'

Fury Road director George Miller may have ideas about a Mad Max sequel, but it doesn't look like he'll be directing it.

8 years, 6 months

George Miller interested in making a Furiosa movie

Miller says he'd like to explore Furiosa's backstory, after Fury Road alluded to it.

8 years, 7 months

Mad Max: Fury Road named 2015 best film of the year by The National Board of Review

Ridley Scott, Brie Larson, and Matt Damon are listed alongside Fury Road on The National Board of Review's 2015 awards.

8 years, 9 months

George Miller says Furiosa isn't in Mad Max sequel story

The Fury Road director also says Mad Max: The Wasteland is not the next film's official title.

8 years, 9 months

George Miller isn't opposed to Mad Max spin-offs

Australian director George Miller can see three other directors who have the right skills to direct a future Mad Max movie.

8 years, 10 months

All four Mad Max films now available on Steam

The big screen Mad Max anthology now available on Steam in most territories, except Australia.

8 years, 11 months

Charlize Theron isn't signed for any Mad Max sequels

The Mad Max: Fury Road star hasn't heard anything about being cast in a sequel.

9 years

You have to watch this insane Mad Max: Fury Road-Star Wars mashup video

Ever wonder what Furiosa might look like wielding a lightsaber? Then check this out.
